segments.text: I don ’ t want you to be worried , but our son has some bad habits now . He says painful words everyday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What words ? Can you tell me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He says kick mommy , beat mommy , don ’ t want mommy , very quickly if I do something that he doesn ’ t like . You know , if I wash his face or change his clothes , things like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , I don ’ t know what to tell you . Of course Tony is a young child . But do not underestimate his ability to learn and reason .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but sometimes he is just not reasonable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest you treat him with patience , affection , and respect . If he needs to do something , like go to bed , or be washed , etc . , please guide or help him to get it done , but lead him with gentleness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s easy to say , but I will try .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Motivate Tony to cooperate by rewarding his good behavior . Do not emphasize punishment for bad moods , etc . Do not threaten him with punishment if he resists the actions you desire .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know my parents sometimes threaten to punish him . But this doesn ’ t work , instead he picks up another bad habit .
segments.speaker: S1
